exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="aboutUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="about-bg_png"/>
	<e:Image width="100%" y="0" height="100%" x="0" source="about_png"/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" horizontalCenter="173.5" verticalCenter="-168">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%" source="close_png" source.down="close_png" source.disabled="close_png" horizontalCenter="-1.5" verticalCenter="-1.5"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label multiline="true" text="开发商：白鹭时代\n版本号：1.0\n使用Egret引擎开发" 
	         x="209" y="309" size="18" width="173" height="102" fontFamily="微软雅黑"
	         stroke="1" strokeColor="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="goodsListIRSkin" width="443" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="listItemBkgd_png"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" text="{data.goodsName}" x="143" y="22" size="20" width="131" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFFF00"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="64" text="{data.comment}" textAlign="left" width="220" size="20" verticalAlign="middle" x="117" textColor="0x72E8FF"/>
	<e:Image height="69" width="66" x="27" y="16" source="{data.icon}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GoodsUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Scroller id="scrListGoods" height="517" width="450" x="14" y="184">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:List id="listGoods" height="110">
				<e:layout> 
					<e:VerticalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
		<e:Skin>
			<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">
				<e:Skin>
					<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source="hScrollBar02_png"  scale9Grid="1,1,4,4"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:VScrollBar>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Button id="btnReturn" x="13" y="132">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnReturn_png" source.down="btnReturn_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image x="166" y="135" width="132" height="37" source="goodsTitle_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="herosListIRSkin" width="443" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="listItemBkgd_png"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" text="{data.heroName}" x="143" y="22" size="20" width="131" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFFF00"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="64" text="{data.comment}" textAlign="left" width="220" size="20" verticalAlign="middle" x="117" textColor="0x72E8FF"/>
	<e:Image height="69" width="66" x="27" y="16" source="{data.icon}"/>
	<e:CheckBox id="cb" x="383" y="23" width="29" height="30" selected="{data.checked}" >
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected">
				<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
					<e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7" source="checkNo_png" source.upAndSelected="checked_png" source.downAndSelected="checked_png" source.disabledAndSelected="checked_png" bottom="0" left="0" width="36"/>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Skin> 
		</e:skinName>
	</e:CheckBox>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HerosUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Scroller id="scrListHeros" height="517" width="450" x="14" y="184">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:List id="listHeros" height="110">
				<e:layout> 
					<e:VerticalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
		<e:Skin>
			<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">
			<e:Skin>
				<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source="hScrollBar01_png"  scale9Grid="1,1,4,4"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:VScrollBar>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Button id="btnReturn" x="13" y="132">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnReturn_png" source.down="btnReturn_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnOK" verticalCenter="-250.5" y="20" horizontalCenter="186.5" x="20">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnOK_png" source.down="btnOK_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="herosTitle_png" x="166" y="135" width="132" height="37"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="homeUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="imgBg" height="100%" width="100%" x="0" y="0" />
	<e:ToggleButton id="mbtnProfile" x="15" y="712" name="玩家" >
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected" minHeight="50" minWidth="100">
				<e:Image scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source.disabledAndSelected="mbtn_BgFc_png" source="mbtn_Bg_png" source.down="mbtn_BgFc_png" x="1" y="6"/>
	<e:Image source="mbtnPlayer_png" y="-2" x="7"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="mbtnHeros" y="715" x="129" name="英雄表" > 
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected" minHeight="50" minWidth="100">
				<e:Image scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source.disabledAndSelected="mbtn_BgFc_png" source="mbtn_Bg_png" source.down="mbtn_BgFc_png" x="0" y="3"/>
				<e:Image source="mbtnHeros_png" x="9" y="3"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="mbtnGoods" y="714" x="242" name="物品表" >
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected" minHeight="50" minWidth="100">
				<e:Image scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source.disabledAndSelected="mbtn_BgFc_png" source="mbtn_Bg_png" source.down="mbtn_BgFc_png" y="4" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="mbtnGoods_png" y="2" x="6"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="mbtnAbout" y="718" x="355" name="关于">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled,disabledAndSelected" minHeight="50" minWidth="100">
				<e:Image scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source.disabledAndSelected="mbtn_BgFc_png" source="mbtn_Bg_png" source.down="mbtn_BgFc_png" x="2" y="0"/>
				<e:Image source="mbtnAbout_png" x="0" y="1"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="profileSkillListIRSkin" width="87" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image height="88" width="87" x="1" y="5" source="skillItemFrame_png"/>
	<e:Image height="71" width="65" x="11" y="14" source="{data.icon}"/>
	<e:Label x="7" y="96" width="76" size="18" textColor="0xFFAC1C" text="{data.name}"
	        stroke="1" strokeColor="0" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="profileUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btnReturn" verticalCenter="-247.5" horizontalCenter="-184.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%"
				         horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnReturn_png" source.down="btnReturn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button y="631.5" x="47">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%"
				horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnEquip_png" source.down="btnEquip_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button y="631.5" x="267">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="90%" height="90%" width.down="100%" height.down="100%"
				horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnStrengthen_png" source.down="btnStrengthen_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image x="916" y="185" source="btnStrengthen_png"/>
	<e:Image source="profileContent_png" x="34" y="193"/>
	<e:Image source="profileTitle_png" x="176" y="136"/>
	<e:Image source="skillBg_png" x="27" y="481" height="136"/>
	
	<e:Scroller height="120" width="410" x="31" y="486" id="scrListSkills">
		<e:viewport>
	<e:List id="listSkills" itemRendererSkinName="profileSkillListIRSkin" height="110">
		<e:layout> 
			<e:HorizontalLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:List>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>
